title: Elevator Effects & Music
description: All the Effects, Voices and Music you'll need for an Elevator/Lift
longDescription:
Elevator Music & Effects 3.0

All the music, voices and sound effects you'll ever need for an Elevator/lift. Including the terrible music, we all hate, your robotic lift Lady OR Gentleman telling you the floor (1-10), doors opening, doors closing AND 21 weird effects for your not-so-normal ride in an Elevator/lift.


DEMOS OF EVERY SOUND AVAILABLE HERE


List of Elevator/Lift Music (12)

  • 6min 58s Loop of all Tracks(Bad Speakers)
  • 6min 58s Loop of all Tracks(No Effects)
  • Afro or Jazz (Bad Speakers) Loop
  • Afro or Jazz (No Effects) Loop
  • Bad Lift Music (Bad Speakers) 1min Loop 1
  • Bad Lift Music (No Effects) 1min Loop 1
  • Hiding Eyes (Bad Speakers) Loop
  • Hiding Eyes (No Effects) Loop
  • Police Station (Bad Speakers) Loop
  • Police Station (No Effects) Loop
  • Portamentos (Bad Speakers) Loop
  • Portamentos (No Effects) Loop


Normal Sound Effects (17)

  • 1st-3rd Floor (Recording of actual Elevator Voice)
  • Bells (x4)
  • Bell & Door Opening
  • Doors Closing (x3)
  • Doors Closing & Lift moving
  • Doors Opening (x5)
  • First Floor and Doors Opening
  • Going up
  • Initial Movement
  • Lift Moving (x6 unique versions)
  • Lift Starting to Move and stopping
  • Lift starting to move
  • Lift stopping (x4)
  • Pushing button (x3)
  • Pushing the button and lift moving
  • Pushing the button in the lift (x2)


Elevator Voices (Recordings of both a Masculine and Feminine voice with both processed and unprocessed files available)

  • Doors Closing
  • Doors Opening
  • Going Up
  • Going Down
  • Lift Going Up (Feminine ONLY)
  • Lift Going Down (Feminine ONLY)
  • 1st Floor - 10th Floor
  • Floor 1 - Floor 10
  • Ground Floor


List of Weird Sound Effects (21)

  • 1st Floor
  • 1st Floor 2
  • 2nd floor
  • 3rd floor 1
  • 3rd floor 2
  • 3rd floor 3
  • 3rd floor 4
  • 3rd floor 5
  • dooooorrrss no reverb
  • dooooorsss
  • Doors closing
  • doors going uppppp
  • Going up doors
  • Low Beep
  • Second Floooooor
  • second floor 2
  • second floor 3
  • second floor 4
  • Second floor
  • um g boop
  • um g
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Â Please see above for all sounds included, alternatively go to THIS LINK to view an extensive list including demos of EVERY SINGLE SOUND INCLUDED so you know exactly what you're getting. Any problems or sounds you would like included in future versions let me know.


Number of Audio Waves: 175

Number of Audio Cues: 175

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 37mins 18s

Supported Development Platforms: Windows/Mac: Yes

Documentation: www.samuel-peter-davies.com/elevator
